content: ITSOZVM2. 2. Run the following commands: ===> ACCESS 193 G ===> LINK PMAINT CF0 CF0 MR ===> ACCESS CF0 Z ===> XEDIT SYSTEM CONFIG Z 354 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 3. Page down to the line immediately before the section with Status of Devices. 4. Insert the lines that are shown in Example 11-3 to the SYSTEM CONFIG Z file. Example 11-3 EDEV SYSTEM CONFIG ITSOZVM1: begin EDEV 3000 EQID EDASD0 TYPE FBA ATTR 2107, FCP_DEV B800 WWPN 500507630500C74C LUN 4010401100000000, FCP_DEV B800 WWPN 50050763050BC74C LUN 4010401100000000, FCP_DEV B900 WWPN 500507630510C74C LUN 4010401100000000, FCP_DEV B900 WWPN 50050763051BC74C LUN 4010401100000000 ITSOZVM1: end ITSOZVM2: begin EDEV 3000 EQID EDASD0 TYPE FBA ATTR 2107, FCP_DEV B800 WWPN 500507630500C74C LUN 4010401100000000, FCP_DEV B800 WWPN 50050763050BC74C LUN 4010401100000000, FCP_DEV B900 WWPN 500507630510C74C LUN 4010401100000000, FCP_DEV B900 WWPN 50050763051BC74C LUN 4010401100000000 ITSOZVM2: end 5. Save and exit XEDIT with
